title: Fan Arrested for Throwing Chips at Tour de France Stars Pogačar and Vingegaard
content:
'He passed a very drunken afternoon:' A fan, identified as a 32-year-old Frenchman, will face a French judge Sunday for aggravated violence.

Read the full article at Fan Arrested for Throwing Chips at Tour de France Stars Pogačar and Vingegaard on Velo.
author: ahood
